titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain drawback claims relating to petroleum products.
A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain drawback claims relating to petroleum products.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Directs the Bureau of Customs and Border Protection to liquidate or reliquidate certain drawback claims relating to petroleum products.
